sentences.en: But within a hundred years after the Inca began building this impressive city, they started to abandon it.
sentences.cn: 但在开始建设这个城市之后一百年，他们又放弃了这个令人印象深刻的印加城市。

sentences.en: He believed the Inca dynasty had far deeper roots, and Maukallacta seemed the logical place to look for them.
sentences.cn: 他认为印加王朝有着更渊源的根，要找出来，毛卡拉塔似乎是个合理的地方。

sentences.en: Inca mummy bundles poke up from the ground at the newly discovered historic cemetery.
sentences.cn: 图为考古学家在几年前发现的一座古墓,在其中挖掘出来的是秘鲁解放战役时期木乃伊群.

sentences.en: Inca version of thin, favour of economical of plate material consumption, conducive to conserve resources.
sentences.cn: 印版薄, 有利于节省版材材料的消耗, 利于节约资源.

sentences.en: Like many of his Inca ancestors, Juan Apaza is possessed by gold.
sentences.cn: 和他许多印加祖先一样, 胡安.阿帕萨的生活完全被黄金占据.

sentences.en: On the way back to the hotel we stopped at Mallorca's 3 rd biggest city, Inca.
sentences.cn: 回酒店的途中我们在马略卡岛的第三大城市, 因卡市停下来.

sentences.en: That's what had happened to the artificial mummies of the Inca rulers.
sentences.cn: 印加统治者的人造木乃伊就是这样的例子.

sentences.en: The salt pans at Maras, in use since pre - Inca days.
sentences.cn: 在马拉什的盐田, 在自前印加天使用.

sentences.en: With this big stick, Inca kings began eyeing the lands and resources of others.
sentences.cn: 有了这根军事大棒，印加帝王开始觊觎别人的土地和资源。

trans.tran_cn: 印加人（古代秘鲁土著人）
trans.tran_en: a member of a South American Indian people whose great empire centred on Peru lasted from about 1100 ad to the Spanish conquest in the early 1530s and is famed for its complex culture
a member of a South American Indian people whose great empire centred on Peru lasted from about 1100 ad to the Spanish conquest in the early 1530s and is famed for its complex culture
